short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your transcript at Kyushu University in excel format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steps to export your transcript: 
1. Log into your Campusmate - Kyushu University 
2. Go to Course Registration/Course Results > Course Results
3. Click on this extension (the one with the "Q" icon)
4. Click `Load`
5. Click `Export`
